location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:70 x 92 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'a'; '47'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:Second view of the Tembi river (possibly a tributary of the Karun river). A horse-drawn carriage stands waiting at centre, facing away from the camera. The river runs from centre to right alongside the carriage.At right and in the background high rocky ranges lead away into the distance.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: 'Tembi River 'Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘a’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘47’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘(April 1917)’
